entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bridgetown
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:02 PM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 5.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Greenwood 5:00 PM ADT Monday 13 March 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 5.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 48 %
Dewpoint: -4.6°C
Wind: NE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with rain beginning in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Fog patches overnight. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 13 March 2023
